doc.course_name: Creating New BigQuery Datasets and Visualizing Insights
doc.course_introduction:
This is the second course in the Data to Insights specialization. Here we will cover how to ingest new external datasets into BigQuery and visualize them with Google Data Studio. We will also cover intermediate SQL concepts like multi-table JOINs and UNIONs which will allow you to analyze data across multiple data sources.
Note: Even if you have a background in SQL, there are BigQuery specifics (like handling query cache and table wildcards) that may be new to you.
>>> By enrolling in this specialization you agree to the Qwiklabs Terms of Service as set out in the FAQ and located at: https://qwiklabs.com/terms_of_service <<<
doc.course_chapter: Introduction//Storing and Exporting Data//Ingesting New Datasets into Google BigQuery//Joining and Merging Datasets//Data Visualization//End of Course Recap
doc.course_sub_chapter: [['Course Introduction', 'Qwiklabs Introduction', 'Recap of Google Analytics ecommerce dataset'], ['Creating Permanent Tables', 'Demo: Importing JSON Data', 'Temporary Tables and Query Results', 'Performance Preview: Query Cache', 'Creating Logical Views', 'Lab Overview', 'Lab Solution'], ['Ingesting New Data into BigQuery', 'Demo: Loading Data into BigQuery', 'Lab Intro', 'Lab Solution'], ['Introducing JOINs and UNIONs', 'Introducing BigQuery Table Wildcards for Easy Merges', 'SQL JOIN Syntax', 'Walkthrough: SQL Join Types', 'Avoiding Pitfalls when Merging Datasets', 'Ecommerce Dataset Recap', 'Lab Intro', 'Lab Solution'], ['Overview of Data Visualization principles', 'Comparing Good and Bad Visualizations', 'Dimensions, Measures, and Reports', 'Introducing Google Data Studio', 'Demo: Data Studio Walkthrough', 'Lab Intro', 'Lab Solution'], ['End of Course Recap']]
doc.reviews: ['Super good course to Introduce you to the main aspects of creating datasets and visualization through Data Studio! ', 'Nice course, quick and objective!', 'Amazing teacher and materials', 'Great course, amazing instructor.', 'Eventually I will get to the ML portion of this Specialization and then the gloves come off. I have some problems i need solved and some ML algorithms to make. My tiny brain can not ingest any more data feeds. I need Biquery and ML to do it for me :)', 'The learning material is very detailed.', 'Muy buen curso', 'great course by google', 'Excellent course! Highly recommended ..', 'Good pace and level of detail.', 'I found this course very helpful for refreshing my skills in important SQL concepts as well as learning more about BigQuery. Data Studio section is a bit shallow. To instructors: You may consider another detailed visualization course.', 'Awesome course!', 'nice course', 'The course should involve more hands on exercises ', 'good', 'Great course for the right audience.', 'Worth the time spent.. Amazing tutor', 'Excelent, very clear explanations ', 'Excellent. Thank you', 'sql and chart', 'Great insights to google cloud and there are some reviews on SQL ', 'An excellent course on BigQuery, supported SQL features and Data Studio for presenting prepared and filtered data. Thank you!', 'Excelent...', 'It would be great if one could practice in bigquery with the public data without consuming the free processing, just during the course. I would like to work to connect all the concepts up to this point and that would be easier if I had a token to use in google cloud platform so no money would be need.', 'UNIONS and JOINS were explained very well here thank you!']
